kpi.name: M1022C141

kpi_info.title: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO AC FOR INTERACTIVE
kpi_info.use: The number of DCH reconfiguration failures for interactive NRT RB due to Admission Control in SRNC in DL. UPDATED: When the DCH reconfiguration for interactive NRT RB in the downlink direction fails due to admission control.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO AC FOR INTERACTIVE
